title: Sell Harlan Estate
metaTitle: Sell Harlan Estate Wine | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Harlan Estate wine. We buy this Napa Valley First Growth. We also buy The Maiden, Bond, and Promontory. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy Harlan Estate and bill brands like Bond and Promontory.
introParagraph: Bill Harlan created Harlan Estate to be a 'First Growth' of California. Its consistent 100-point scores have cemented its status as a top collectible. We purchase Harlan Estate, its second wine The Maiden, and associated brands like Bond Estates and Promontory. Sell your Napa cult wines directly to us.
whatWeBuy: Bond Estates (St. Eden, Vecina, Melbury, Quella, Pluribus)
whatWeDoNotBuy: Matriarch (Bond second wine, unless part of collection)
pricingFactors: Brand (Flagship Harlan is worth more than Bond)

faqs.question: Do you buy Bond Estates?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy all the single vineyard wines from Bond: St. Eden, Vecina, Melbury, Quella, and Pluribus.

faqs.question: What is Promontory?
faqs.answer: Promontory is another estate founded by the Harlan family. It has quickly become a highly valued collectible.

faqs.question: Do you buy The Maiden?
faqs.answer: Yes, The Maiden is the second wine of Harlan Estate and is purchased regularly.

faqs.question: Are older vintages valuable?
faqs.answer: Yes, early vintages from the 1990s are becoming rarer and are very desirable.

faqs.question: How do I ship large bottles?
faqs.answer: Harlan bottles are heavy. We recommend using our specific molded pulp or foam shipping kits to ensure safety.

faqs.question: Do you buy 100-point vintages?
faqs.answer: Yes, perfect scoring vintages like 1994, 1997, 2001, 2002, 2007, 2013 etc. are top priorities.
